mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (bno, pcno, reply, replier, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{bno}, #{pcno}, #{reply}, #{replier}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, coalesce(pcno, rno) as pcno, reply, replier, reg_date, up_date FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY pcno asc, rno asc
SELECT rno, bno, pcno, reply, replier, reg_date, up_date FROM reply WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET reply = #{reply}, up_date = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno} and replier = #{replier}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
